Posts.Content: marty71 wrote: Just had the lumpectomy - was cancer, very , very small, no lymph nodes was invaded.  Oncotype came back at 34! I have the tough decision - milder chemo or the more aggressive chemo plus radiation for both afterwards.  I cannot wrap my head around which one - leaning more towards the lesser treatment.  Anyone out there with same problem??
